6l11439m52a46yc.reply_to_user: Ok, I got you! We will build a simple to-do application with functionalities to add, edit, delete tasks and subtasks, categorize them, and set deadlines.

epics.title: Task Management
epics.description: Users can manage their primary tasks and subtasks.

stories.title: Add Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new task so that I can keep track of my to-dos.

tasks.task: Design the user interface for adding a task
Implement backend logic for storing the task
Add form validation for task input
Develop notification for successful task creation

acceptance_criteria: Task is saved successfully in the database
User receives a confirmation message after task creation
Newly created task appears in the task list

stories.title: Edit Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit an existing task to update its details.

tasks.task: Create an interface for editing a task
Implement logic to update task in the database
Ensure the updated task reflects in the task list

acceptance_criteria: The changes made to the task are saved in the database
User receives a confirmation message after editing
The task list shows the updated details

stories.title: Delete Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete a task that I no longer need to keep.

tasks.task: Implement delete functionality on the task interface
Confirm with the user before deleting a task
Remove the deleted task from the database

acceptance_criteria: Task is removed from the database
User receives a confirmation message after deletion
Deleted task no longer appears in the task list

stories.title: Add Subtask
stories.description: As a user, I want to add subtasks to my tasks for better organization.

tasks.task: Create a user interface for adding subtasks
Link subtasks to their respective parent tasks in the database
Implement validation for subtask input

acceptance_criteria: Subtask is saved in the database under the correct parent task
User receives a confirmation message after subtask creation
Subtask appears under the corresponding main task

stories.title: Edit Subtask
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit a subtask to update its details as needed.

tasks.task: Create an interface for editing a subtask
Implement logic to update the subtask in the database

acceptance_criteria: Changes made to the subtask are reflected in the database
User receives a confirmation message after editing
Subtask details are updated in the task list

stories.title: Delete Subtask
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete a subtask that is no longer needed.

tasks.task: Implement delete functionality for subtasks
Confirm with the user before deleting a subtask
Remove the deleted subtask from the database

acceptance_criteria: Subtask is removed from the database
User receives a confirmation message after deletion
Deleted subtask no longer appears under the parent task

epics.title: Task Categorization and Deadlines
epics.description: Users can categorize tasks and set deadlines for better organization.

stories.title: Categorize Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to categorize my tasks so that I can group them by type or project.

tasks.task: Create category options in the task creation interface
Develop logic to link tasks with selected categories in the database

acceptance_criteria: Tasks can be assigned to categories during creation
The task list allows filtering by category

stories.title: Set Deadline on Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to set a deadline for my tasks so that I can prioritize my workload.

tasks.task: Add a deadline input field in the task creation and editing interfaces
Implement logic to store deadlines in the database

acceptance_criteria: Tasks are saved with associated deadlines
User receives a notification for reminders on upcoming deadlines
